title.en: Kiraware Oujo wa Juo-sama no Okiniiri

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ王女は獣王様のお気に入り
嫌われ王女は獣王様のお気に入り～毒姫がリセットした人生で溺愛されます～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kiraware Ojo ha Juo-sama no Okiniiri
Kiraware Ojo ha Juo-sama no Okiniiri: Dokuhime ga Reset shita Jinsei de Dekiai saremasu

altTitles.en: The Princess Everyone Hates Is the Beast King's Favorite
The Princess Everyone Hates Is the Beast King's Favorite: The Poison Princess's Life Is Reset and Then She Finds Love

altTitles.fr: La princesse poisonneuse et le roi des bêtes

description.en:
The First Princess of the Elixir Kingdom, Roselia is referred to as the 'Poison Princess' and is hated by many. She was unfortunately born with the power to create poisons rather than the ability to create 'Cure Potions' — a healing power passed down in the royal family. Roselia was given the chance to have her position solidified as the heir to the throne after her mother died. The condition? To be able to create Cure Potions before the age of eighteen. Roselia, alone, tries her hardest to create cure potions, and then she met the one of the few people who have ever treated her nicely, Lord Elliott, her cousin! She finds herself drawn to him and he proposed, only to betray her!

"Do you wish to rewind your life?"

At her lowest moment, overcome with despair, the Poison Princess's fate changes, and she heads off onto a new journey to find happiness and... maybe even love...?
description.ja:
癒やしの力を持つ王族の中で、毒の力を持って生まれ忌み嫌われた王女・ロゼリア。どん底の彼女にある転機が訪れる──!?

エリクシール王国の第１王女・ロゼリアは、周囲から「毒姫」と忌み嫌われていた。王族は代々、キュアポーションを生み出す癒やしの力を持って生まれるのに、彼女は毒しか生み出せなかったからだ。母が亡くなったことを契機に父王に、条件つきで王位継承権を認められる。「成人する18歳までに癒やしの力を身につけること」「その間何者も毒の力で傷つけないこと」…孤独に堪えながらも、癒やしの力を身につけようと努力を重ねていくロゼリア。そんな彼女にある転機が訪れる──!?
